description: Young Theo contacted me a year ago to audition for Maskurbate. At the time he'd just started working out and I felt he needed a little more definition to fit our criteria. When I saw his recent pics, I gladly invited him to my place for his first shot at porn. If he keeps going to the gym and gains more confidence, I predict that he'll be very successfull in this industry. He is very open to try new things so, if you guys like him, you'll probably see more of Theo in the future.
title: Theo's Audition, Scene #01
